  • 方法详细资料

    • checkGoal

      public boolean checkGoal(Shelf shelf)
      public CommonGoalXShape(){ /** the check since follow the sequence position cell (marked by a ° ) ????? ?°°°? ?°°°? ?°°°? ?°°°? ????? each ° have an adjacent check (4 element), which CENTER can recorde the [row, column] of the principle position (the ° ) and secondary position [row-1,column-1], [row-1, column+1],[row+1, column-1], [row+1, column+1], if one of the 4 rest element is different by the first, the vector is not matched (discard) so we have completely 12 check , if check fall when the all 12 is different by the CENTER position if one is completed then return true and get the points. *}
      指定者:
      checkGoal 在类中 CommonGoal
      参数:
      shelf - the shelf to be scanned
      返回:
      true if the goal is achieved, false otherwise
